description: {"blocks":[{"key":"869bc","text":"The Titan_ClearLabs workflow is a part of the Public Health Viral Genomics Titan series for SARS-CoV-2 genomic characterization. Titan_CleanLabs was written to process Clear Labs read data for SARS-CoV-2 ARTIC V3 amplicon sequencing. Upon initiating a Titan_ClearLabs run, input read data provided for each sample will be processed to perform consensus genome assembly, infer the quality of both raw read data and the generated consensus genome, and assign lineage or clade designations as outlined in the Titan_ClearLabs data workflow below.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2kp2t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bc4l","text":"Additional technical documentation for the Titan_ClearLabs workflow is available at:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"a0c6o","text":"https://public-health-viral-genomics-theiagen.readthedocs.io/en/latest/titan_workflows.html#titan-clearlabs","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":107}],"data":[]},{"key":"6gqt1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"979j4","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"8hubs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5srr3","text":"Required input data for Titan_ClearLabs:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":40}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b99jr","text":"Cear Labs FASTQ read files (single FASTQ file per sample)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8m61r","text":"Primer sequence coordinates of the PCR scheme utilized in BED file format","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dd6rk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ark77","text":"Video Instruction:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cldj5","text":"Theiagen Genomics: Titan Genomic Characterization","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dq3b9","text":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zP9I1r6TNrw","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":43}],"data":[]},{"key":"6s4rq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9c6c4","text":"Theiagen technical assistance, please contact us at: TOAST@cdc.gov","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":48,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"254ke","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"27452CF1B80111EB9DCC0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://public-health-viral-genomics-theiagen.readthedocs.io/en/latest/titan_workflows.html#titan-clearlabs"}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"4716DC50302011EC8116AD02CB31B245","height":393,"id":185415,"is_video":false,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8jm8e","text":"Titan fork_info.title: Titan Clear Labs SARS-CoV-2 Strain Characterization Workflow for the Terra Platform

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"d3ocd","text":"To run the Titan_ClearLabs workflow, click on the 'Workflows' panel in the newly created workspace. It should bring you to your workflow page.  Click on the 'Titan_ClearLabs' tile to bring up the Titan_ClearLabs assembly workflow page (if you do not see the Titan_ClearLabs workflow in your workspace, please see our video on importing a workflow to Terra.bio: https://youtu.be/ZRpQylIDMzo).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":361,"length":28}],"data":{}},{"key":"bt4tl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5f214","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2spg7","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"46oun","text":"This will bring up the Titan_ClearLabs workflow page:   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bgbpf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fku2r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7h18g","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"r1gs","text":"Select the version of the workflow you would like to run. Double check that you are using the latest version of the workflow. Alternately, you may specify another version, but should only pick a stable version (with numbers) NOT a 'main' or 'dev' version. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":58,"length":68},{"style":"bold","offset":171,"length":85}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1h4e2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1trpr","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cjqd8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1lv5i","text":"Ensure that \"Run workflow(s) with inputs defined by data table\" is selected and the \"Use call caching\" is checked and then select the root entity type for the data you wish to analyze","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a83ou","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b4arl","text":"NOTE: Call caching allows Terra to identify and skip jobs that have been run previously; this option is by default enabled to avoid unnecessary compute costs. More information on Terra call caching, including examples of when you may want to disable this feature, is available through the Terra Support Documentation. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[{"key":4,"offset":289,"length":27}],"data":{}},{"key":"6g6vl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ub3t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ae7du","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":5,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4c8s5","text":"Click \"SELECT DATA\" and choose the samples you wish to analyze","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"jt0d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"45d9o","text":"     ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":6,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ahh9n","text":"Complete the INPUTS form with the appropriate attributes (if you have not yet uploaded any Clear Labs data to Terra.bio please reach out to the Theiagen Genomics bioinformatics support team [support@terrapublichealth.zendesk.com] and we will help you to establish Terra.bio integration with the Clear Labs portal\")","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1hv7g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"foj02","text":"The top two rows represent variables that have to be provided by the user. This was the information that we populated the sample data table with in the previous step. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":74}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"hit9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ci5et","text":"In our example, for the first row, the 'clear_lab_fastq' variable, we clicked on the 'Attribute' text box and wrote 'this.clearlabs_fastq_gz' to indicate that the 'clear_lab_fastq' we wish to analyze are under the 'clearlabs_fastq_gz' column of our selected datatable. In the second row we input our primer_bed file of choice, which should be saved as a workspace element in Terra (if you do not have this saved as a workspace element please see our video on uploading a workspace element: https://youtu.be/Qrbz7uRtwmQ). In the third row, the 'samplename' variable, we selected on the 'Attribute' text box and wrote 'this.clearlabs_specimen_id' to indicate the 'samplename' of each sample we are analyzing can be found in the `Test_ONT_sample_id' column of our selected datatable. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":7,"offset":490,"length":28}],"data":{}},{"key":"536lc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b359a","text":"NOTE: If you named your columns something other than reads then just type \"this.\" followed by whatever the column name is. We would advise naming your reads column \"reads\" for clarity.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1c5ub","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fhupj","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":8,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d5uts","text":"Once your input form is complete, move on to the OUTPUTS form and select \"Use Defaults'. Terra will then populate the OUTPUTS form with all of the default outputs options generated by the workflow. If you forget to do this you won't have easily accessible results! Save these changes by clicking the 'Save' button.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":265,"length":49}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2pe4f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d77jh","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":9,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9jh1a","text":"Once your INPUTS and OUTPUTS forms are complete, click the 'Save' button on the top right-hand side of the page. The yellow caution icons should disappear and the Run Analysis option should be made available. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7refq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ahf8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"770fc","text":"    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":10,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2fkvb","text":"You are now ready to run the Titan_ClearLabs workflow! Click on the 'Run Analysis' button to the right of the 'Outputs' tab. A popup window should appear titled 'Confirm launch'. If the 'Run Analysis' button is greyed out, you need to save your recent changes by clicking the 'Save' button. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"510dj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c227b","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":11,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6s15m","text":"Clicking the 'Launch' button should bring you to the 'Job History' panel where each sample will be queued for the Titan_ClearLabs analysis. The status will change from queued to submitted to running. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7bs1t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"asn53","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":12,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bmggi","text":"Any trouble at all please feel free to check out our video on Running the Titan_ClearLabs Workflow, or reach out to our support email: support@terrapublichealth.zendesk.com","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"24D83E6243F811EC8AE50A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://youtu.be/ZRpQylIDMzo"}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"B323F3C0BD6011EB985357B6521E392C","height":191,"id":185423,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"terra_ClearLabs_run1.PNG","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fxctbjpyx.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fxcrbjpyx.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fxcsbjpyx.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fxcqbjpyx.webp","width":550}},"10":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"4E844090B33911EBBB84EDA274FCA3E6","height":161,"id":185441,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"run_analysis.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fr9ibi7mf.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fxdbbi7mf.jpg","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fxdabi7mf.webp","width":550}},"11":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"665EAAC0B33911EBBB84EDA274FCA3E6","height":159,"id":185427,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"launch.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fr8ebi7mf.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fxcvbi7mf.jpg","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fxcubi7mf.webp","width":550}},"12":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"42814070B1A111EBB40975DF9404E2ED","height":171,"id":185443,"is_video":false,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"d8hp9","text":"Job history screen after launching Terra job","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":[]},"mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"Screen Shot 2021-05-10 at 8.06.00 AM.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fr72bi7mf.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fxddbi7mf.jpg","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fxdcbi7mf.webp","width":550}},"2":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"FE868170BD6011EB985357B6521E392C","height":194,"id":185429,"is_video":false,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4d5h4","text":"The Titan ClearLabs assembly workflow page","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":[]},"mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"terra_ClearLabs_run2.PNG","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fxczbjpyx.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fxcxbjpyx.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fxcybjpyx.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fxcwbjpyx.webp","width":550}},"3":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"D9356820BD6311EB985357B6521E392C","height":195,"id":185445,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"terra_ClearLabs_run3.PNG","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fxdhbjpyx.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fxdfbjpyx.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fxdgbjpyx.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fxdebjpyx.webp","width":550}},"4":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"ADB92410B34111EBBB84EDA274FCA3E6","url":"https://support.terra.bio/hc/en-us/articles/360047664872-Call-caching-How-it-works-and-when-to-use-it#h_01EZ8MX3MH1AX2MM92QQ6NZAGG"}},"5":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"6FD39C30B34011EBBB84EDA274FCA3E6","height":258,"id":185433,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"CALL_CACHE.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fr89bi7mf.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fxc3bi7mf.jpg","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fxc2bi7mf.webp","width":550}},"6":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"F3A4DAE0B33811EBBB84EDA274FCA3E6","height":313,"id":185421,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"select_data.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files
